People

We have an institutional partnership with the Gilmore Center for Financial Technology at Warwick Business School

  • Barry Quinn (Senior Lecturer in Finance, Technology and Data Science) Director

  • Fearghal Kearney ( Senior Lecturer in Quantitative Finance) Director

  • Gareth Campbell (Professor of Finance)

  • Declan Breslin (Honorary Professor of Practice in Financial Services)

  • Clare Guinness (Innovation Director, Belfast Region City Deal)

  • Philip Hamill (Professor of Finance, Associate Provost for Research and Academic Department, Abu Dhabi University)

  • Paul Miller (Reader of Computer Science, Deputy Head of the Centre for Secure and Intelligence Technologies)

  • Hui Wang (Professor of Computer Science)

  • Laura Steele (Senior Lecturer of Management)

  • Clive Walker (Lecturer in Finance)

  • Byron Graham (Senior Lecturer in Business Analytics)

  • Qiao (Olivia) Peng (Lecturer in Business Analytics)

  • Colm Kelly (Machine Learning Researcher, FundAxis Ltd; PhD candidate in financial machine learning and asset pricing, submitting Sept 22)

  • Abhishek Pramanick (PhD Candidate in regulatory technology and financial inclusion, incoming Sept 22)

  • Fei Li (PhD Candidate in XAI and ESG `fair value’ pricing, incoming Sept 22)

  • Veronica Zhang (PhD Candidate in Regulatory Implications in the development of the Chinese banking sector (submitting July 2023)
